seo.og_title: Genzi Meraih Mimpi - Real Digital Solutions
seo.og_description: A digital squad that turns everyday frustrations into solutions that actually slap.

hero.description: We start from everyday frustrations, then turn them into digital products people actually use, test, and become sustainable businesses. Not just random side projects.

philosophy.label: OUR PHILOSOPHY
philosophy.quote2: What's pricey is a solution that actually solves problems.
philosophy.description: So many little things cause headaches. Genzi was born to turn all that mess into digital solutions that are quick, anti-drama, and hit different.

howWeWork.label: HOW WE WORK
howWeWork.headline: How Do We Turn Ideas Into Products Tho?

steps.title: Hunt for Drama
steps.desc: We're nosy about real problems that actually stress people out. Not made-up ones just to look cool.

steps.title: Test the Waters
steps.desc: Ask around, do light research. Don't wanna build something nobody needs. That's just sad, bestie.

steps.title: Build the Lite Version
steps.desc: Make an MVP that works first. Rough around the edges? It's fine. As long as it does the job and people can use it.

steps.title: Test with the Squad
steps.desc: Get the squad or users to try it. If they like it and come back, we're golden. If not, back to the drawing board.

steps.title: Full Send!
steps.desc: Once validated and traction is fire, we go full throttle. Build complete features, chase the bag, build the business.

whatWeBuild.label: WHAT WE BUILD
whatWeBuild.headline: Digital Products That Aren't Just Cool, But Have IMPACT!

items.title: Our Own Products
items.desc: Our unhinged ideas that we actually turned into real businesses. From zero, we handle everything till it's profitable.

items.title: Help the Homies
items.desc: For y'all who have ideas but don't know how to build them. Come, we'll help, we'll build together.

items.title: The Experiment Lab
items.desc: Our playground for experiments. Not everything hits, but it's fun to learn and sometimes we find hidden gems.

about.headline: Building the Digital Future Together
about.imageDesc: Where unhinged ideas meet execution that's not half-baked.
about.card1Desc: Genzi was born to turn 'delusional' ideas into real works. We build digital products relevant to today's world.
about.card2Desc: Dare to collab, dare to try, and it must have impact. Those three things? We carry them everywhere.

ideaCta.headline: Don't Let Ideas Stay as Just Talk.
ideaCta.description: The world needs your solutions, not just wishful thinking. At Genzi, we help build your ideas into reality.
ideaCta.card1Title: Got a Wild Idea in Your Head?
ideaCta.card1Desc: Or found a problem that annoys you every day? Don't keep it to yourself. Tell us, who knows it might become a fire solution!
ideaCta.card2Desc: Join the waiting list to be the first to try Genzi's experimental products. Limited stock, let's gooo!
ideaCta.waitlistSuccess: Slay! You're in the waiting list üéâ

aboutPage.heroDesc: Real talk ‚Äì we're actually just a bunch of young people who believe technology can be used to make real impact and benefit lots of people.
aboutPage.storyDecoration: Not Empty Space for Ads. This is Just Decoration Because We Didn't Know What to Put Here.
aboutPage.storyPara1: So here's the tea, everyone. Back in college, we were always brainstorming ideas to start our own business to earn extra pocket money, while also sharpening our skills and gaining life experience. It started with gadget repair services, then we took on web and design projects offered by others. Typical IT student side jobs lah. The result? Enough for coffee, hanging out, and we got that feeling of 'wow, I can earn my own money!'
aboutPage.storyPara2: When we were close to graduating, we got attracted to the dream of working at startups. Y'know the benefits are insane ‚Äì great salaries, cool culture, stock options, etc. Some of us tried applying, but it ended up as just nice try and maybe not our luck yet. That's when the idea came up 'What if we build our own startup?' At first we were super hyped, with many ideas like 'our product must do this and that, if it works out it'll definitely blow up'. But reality slapped us hard and we realized our business experience was basically zero. So that dream was put on hold, we chose to work according to our passions to gather experience and stability.
aboutPage.storyPara3: Time passed, and 'Adulting' really started hitting different. The beautiful hopes from our youth started facing reality. Many things made us think again ‚Äì fear of running out of money before payday, fear of not being able to buy a house because property prices are insane, fear of not having savings for marriage (honestly optional tho, traveling the world sounds better right?) or helping parents, fear of sudden layoffs like the waves happening recently. Especially in this Gen Z adult era, we're haunted by so many things ‚Äì anxiety about job security, side hustles that never profit, inflation that keeps raising even coffee prices, burnout from working 24/7. The country's situation also adds mental burden ‚Äì confusing government policies, piling new taxes, economic ups and downs making the future hard to predict.
aboutPage.storyPara4: But precisely because of those thoughts, the old dream that had sunk before resurfaced. Now we have more mature work experience, sharpened skills, plus some other supporting factors that seemed to say 'isn't it time to test our knowledge?' Finally, Genzi Meraih Mimpi was born!
aboutPage.storyPara5: TBH we want to increase income and live more comfortably. BUT more than that, there's this feeling of 'what can we do for society?' in the midst of our country's current condition. We're restless seeing brilliant ideas from Indonesian youth just passing by in hangout conversations. We believe Gen Z's potential is massive if channeled properly, it can blow up!
aboutPage.quote:

A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step
aboutPage.pillarsSubtitle: This is what keeps us sane and not just randomly making apps.

pillars.title: Problems = Opportunities
pillars.desc: We love hearing problem rants. Not for gossiping, but to find how they can become fire digital solutions.

pillars.title: Users Are Besties
pillars.desc: We don't just randomly make apps, we make them for many people to use. So listening to user feedback is mandatory ‚Äì like listening to your own bestie.

pillars.title: Go Together
pillars.desc: No lone heroes here. We believe good team collaboration makes the vibes of building products even more fun.

aboutPage.teamHeadline: Wanna get to know us first?
aboutPage.teamSubtitle: These are the humans who (finally stopped being all talk) made Genzi Meraih Mimpi stand and run.

productsPage.comingSoonDesc: So sorry everyone, we're still preparing our first app that'll be perfect for y'all to use later. Kindly wait, yeah!

contact.successDesc: Thanks for stopping by! We'll get back to you ASAP.
